title.rendered: SS Internation Tiny Tots students attends value session education

content.rendered:
300 students of SS International Tiny Tots Public School, Nagpur, Maharashtra, attended value education session conducted by Smile Foundation, under the Child for Child programme. The students were enthusiastic and eager to learn throughout the session and enjoyed it thoroughly.

Smile Foundation visits various privileged schools across India and conducts engaging sessions for the young minds, under CFC programme. Children are sensitized in various causes, value systems and are ushered to realize their importance in growing up as responsible citizens of the country.
